name: FakeMovieFacts
0:
”Alexa, begin fake movie facts”
”Alexa, open fake movie facts”
”Alexa, ask fake movie facts to give me a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fake movie facts
des: When prompted by users, Alexa will speak a random fake movie fact from a list of facts. No special hardware or device restriction for this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
